actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to establish additional goals for airport master plans.

summary.text: Airport Master Plan Customer Convenience Enhancement, Security, and Sustainability Act of 2009 or the ACCESS Act 2009 - Encourages airport sponsors and state and local officials in the development of their airport master plans to take into account as additional goals: (1) customer convenience and access to airport facilities; and (2) threats of a terrorist attack, including the need to continually adjust plans to address new terrorist threats.

titles.title: Airport Master Plan Customer Convenience Enhancement, Security, and Sustainability Act of 2009
To amend title 49, United States Code, to establish additional goals for airport master plans.
